overview.en: SEGI is a comprehensive technology based on decentralized, social, fully open source, computing power and Internet infrastructure. The open source software designed and released is a branch application on the chain network and a kind of information storage system based on the chain.
overview.zh: SEGI是一个基于去中心化、社交性的、全开源的、算力与互联网基础建设集合为一的综合性技术。设计发布的开源软件是链上网络上的一个分支应用，是一种基于链上的信息存储系统。
